A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: They're some great scenes in this movie\, Mark Hamill and Carrie Fisher are remarkable in the film. But there are also scenes that make you notice flaws in the film\, and plot points that fans will either love or hate. Finn's plot narrative in the movie is probably the weakest\, and it kinda diminishes how good he was in TFA. Overall though it's an enjoyable movie to watch\, but there are points in the movie that will split the fanbase.
